data.title: Altenburg Friedrich II, horoscope for birth date 28 July 1676 Jul.Cal. (7 Aug 1676 greg.), born in Gotha, with Astrodatabank biography
data.meta_description: Horoscope and astrology data of Duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg Friedrich II born on 28 July 1676 Jul.Cal. (7 Aug 1676 greg.) Gotha, Germany, with biography
data.text:
Name

Friedrich II, Duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg Gender: M

born on 28 July 1676 Jul.Cal. (7 Aug 1676 greg.) at 18:00 (= 6:00 PM ) Place Gotha, Germany, 50n57, 10e41 Timezone LMT m10e41 (is local mean time) Data source

Bio/autobiography

Rodden Rating B Collector: Scholfield

Astrology data 15°48' 24°22 Asc. 14°46'

Biography

German nobleman, a duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg. He was the fifth child and first son of Friedrich I, Duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg and Magdalene Sibylle of Saxe-Weissenfels. After the death of his father, in 1691, Friedrich/Frederick II assumed the duchy of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg. On 7 June 1696, he married his first cousin, Magdalena Augusta of Anhalt-Zerbst. They had nineteen children. He died 23 March 1732.

Link to Wikipedia biography

Relationships

parent->child relationship with Friederike of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg (born 17 July 1715)

parent->child relationship with Johann Adolf, Prince of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg (born 18 May 1721)

parent->child relationship with Wilhelm, Prince of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg (born 12 March 1701)

child->parent relationship with Friedrich I, Duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg (born 15 July 1646 Jul.Cal. (25 July 1646 greg.))

sibling relationship with Dorothea Maria, Duchess of Saxe-Meiningen (born 22 January 1674 Jul.Cal. (1 Feb 1674 greg.))

sibling relationship with Friederike, Princess of Anhalt-Zerbst (born 24 March 1675 Jul.Cal. (3 Apr 1675 greg.))

sibling relationship with Johann Wilhelm, Duke of Saxe-Gotha-Altenburg (born 4 October 1677 Jul.Cal. (14 Oct 1677 greg.))

Events

Death, Cause unspecified 23 March 1732 (Age 55)

chart Placidus Equal_H.

Source Notes

Sy Scholfield quotes "Beiträge zum StaatsRecht und der Geschichte von Sachsen: Aus ungedruckten Quellen, Volume 2" by Bernhard Gottlieb Huldreich von Hellfeld and Ludwig Karl von Hellfeld (Wittekindt, 1788), p. 359: "gebohren worden, Freitags, den 28. Julii Anno 1676. abends furß nach 6. Uhren."

Translation: born, Friday, 28 July 1676 in the evening after 6 o'clock.

Note: 28 July 1676 OS was a Friday.
